title: Business regulations effect on PL and output

content.question:
What will be the short-run effect of a reduction in business regulations on real output and the price level?
Real OutputPrice LevelAIncreaseNo changeBIncreaseDecreaseCDecreaseIncreaseDDecreaseDecreaseENo changeDecrease

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
